addressComponents.longText: Down stair in The Market Line
addressComponents.shortText: Down stair in The Market Line

formattedAddress: Down stair in The Market Line, 115 Delancey St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: Down stair in The Market Line, 115 Delancey St, New York, NY 10002-3205, USA

originalText.text: On a visit to NYC over a rainy weekend late this Spring, I stopped into Essex Market for a coffee and was intrigued by this uniquely styled sling.  After an engaging conversation with the owner, David, I was drawn to the slim lined design aesthetic of the “Solo Sling” or as my coworker calls it - Ma’ling (man sling).  I travel around the US for hiking and photography and knew this minimal design would compliment my ways of walking and free up pockets for lite treks and especially for everyday happenings.  It was the best travel souvenir I have invested in in a long while based on three factors:  metropolitan style, functionality and follow through.  I was back in the City this past weekend for museums and music and saw a paste poster ad for Smith + Parka while walking bridges on the way into the city.  I knew I had to stop by and say hello with sling in tow.  David was at it, working on a product and looked up with a smile of recognition. After catching up a moment I shared how pleased I was with it and it’s everyday use, even offering a suggestion to add a little inside paracord for tucking/clasping keys to they don’t move around and scratch glasses or phone screens.  Without hesitation, he offered to make that happen right on the spot. That’s customer service at 200% in my world. He just wanted to make it right and did so with grace and kindness while we explored the market around him.  My friend was so impressed that later that evening she shared she’s going to purchase one for herself! It’s a well made, highly styled minimalist tote for everyday use that functions as a stylish accessory for the city and beyond.

originalText.text:
I got a solo a few weeks ago and also got one for my boyfriend because his birthday is coming up. I’ve been looking for a sling bag for us since we will be going nomading soon.

Initially, I was going to get a bag from lululemon, because I already had one, but once I stumbled across David’s shop I decided I had to get the bags from him instead.

The bags are very sturdy, and the craftsmanship is solid. I love the different colors, textures and fabrics he uses so I can find one that best suits my taste.

David was very engaging, flexible and patient as I took a while to decide on one for myself and my boyfriend, even though we needed an exchange for my boyfriend because he ended up wanting the black calfskin leather solo instead.

I also love the separation in the solo bag so I know where it slip my phone in and where to put my keys and wallet whereas when I am using my lululemon waist bag, my things seem to be in a disarray everywhere.

Highly recommend the solo bag. I also love the concept of when you own a solo bag, you’re part of the solo community.

I saw another girl with a solo bag on the subway platform wearing his bag and I was even tempted to say hello!

originalText.text:
Smith + Parka is one of those stores that showcases everything amazing about New York City. It's founder, David Lee, is multi-talented. Every single part of his storefront? Made by hand. By David.

If that's not crazy enough, all of his leather goods are also made by hand. In his store. By David. You'll notice a theme here. David uses his many, many years at the helm of various fashion houses to make limited edition one-of-a-kind creations that are equally unique and sexy.

When you talk to David, you get the distinct feeling you're getting to talk to a star in the making - someone you're going to see on the front cover of a magazine or two in a decade or so. I felt lucky to meet him.

originalText.text:
Thank you Mr. Lee for such a functional, versatile Solo Sling Bag. I'm comfortable wearing it under the arm,  across the shoulder, and at the waistline.  It feels great to be "hands free". The leather bag is perfectly designed and perfectly hand crafted inside out. It holds everything I need. I love my bag...I love my bag!! This is definitely my go-to bag in the City and especially traveling abroad. I'll patiently wait for your next creation.

B.Jones

originalText.text: I purchased the Barbie pink solo in July. The quality is amazing and you can tell it was hand crafted with care. I’ve received so many compliments on the bag and just moments after I bought it someone came up to me and said “is this designer?” The bag is super convenient and easy to carry the essentials in a hands free, and stylish way.
